A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Watching this was like watching a director unbuckle their seat beat and drive 100 MPH into a brick wall. Were they trying to kill a franchise on purpose\, because that is what happen for me at least. The previous reboot was ok in comparison. Wont see the 3rd installment in theaters because of this mess.  Such a shame\, so much wasted potential here.
